solo.io | Cambridge, MA or remote | Full Time | https://www.solo.io

solo is an exciting new startup (https://trueventures.com/solo-future-of-cloud/, https://www.solo.io/single-post/2017/11/01/Solo’s-seed-fundi...), currently we are hiring:

* systems engineer (https://www.solo.io/system-software-engineer) * UX Engineer (https://www.solo.io/copy-of-system-software-engineer)

In this role you'll work with a wide rage of tech like: Serverless, Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos, Linux, Unikernels, AWS and Google Cloud, Azure, ectd, istio, Golang and more. We don't expect someone coming into the role to have experience with everything, but would like someone that is excited to learn!

checkout our past projects: - unik (https://github.com/cf-unik/unik) - squash (https://github.com/solo-io/squash)
